Text.Page:
The eggheads in the Enlightened Union seem to always have noctenium on hand. Let's cut their stash off at the source, shall we?

Infiltrate their territory and harvest noctenium from {@linkcreature:122#202#tor mugatos} and {@linkcreature:122#205#oasis ghilliedhus}.

Bringing back noctenium isn't quite as important as keeping the union from having it, so do what you will with whatever noctenium you find.
Your work lends the order strength!
